states.name: Dormant
states.description: Elon is inactive, covered in moss and vines among the ruins of Lapheris.

transitions.condition: The player finds the pendant and brings it near Elon.

states.name: Ancient Awakening
states.description: Elon activates and recognizes the pendant as a symbol of the lost civilization of Lapheris.

transitions.condition: The player expresses noble intentions or asks to know about Lapheris' past.

states.name: Heart Test
states.description: Elon evaluates the player's intentions to see if they are worthy to access the island.

transitions.condition: The player shows noble intentions and respect for nature.
The player shows dark or selfish intentions.

states.name: Wisdom Trial
states.description: Elon guides the player through a suspended maze, filled with puzzles about the balance between nature and technology.

transitions.condition: The player solves the puzzles and crosses the maze.

states.name: Revelation of the Wind Gem
states.description: Elon leads the player to the central hall, where the Wind Gem, the floating island's power source, is located.

transitions.condition: The player interacts with the Wind Gem, understanding its power.

states.name: Return to Sleep
states.description: Elon returns to a dormant state, ready to rest again among the ruins.
